page.title: 04DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up,at 7.30. I go down stairs and I have my breakfast. I feed my dog Max and then I have my cup of tea. I get ready for school and then I go and knock for Sam and we walk to school together. After the register has been taken I take it to the secretary. Then I go to my maths group. At 10.15 we have song practice. One of the songs we sing is 'When I'm Sixty Four'. After song practice we go out to play. In the playground I play hard. For dinner I have a packed lunch. After school I go to gymnastics. It is good. Ihave been in for a lot of grading tests. When I get in I play outside and then I go in and watch the television. My favourite programme is Dallas. I go to bed at 10.30 pm.
